web design + development

I specialize in creating clean, beautiful, & user-friendly websites. I'm currently available for select freelance projects. You can reach me at hello@yvetteaban.com.

  • Imagine Careers

    ui design, web design

    Imagine Careers wants to change the way that people search for jobs. They're doing so with a discovery platform that lets you find companies that fit you based on factors that matter to you. Whether that's retirement benefits, work flexibility, or dress code.

    I was brought in to help visualize their ideas for the platform, as well as to redesign the company website.

    Check out the platform or visit the website.
